protein.specific_function: Putative ubiquitin-specific-processing protease that regulates cell growth and survival. Probably regulates CDC25A expression at a transcriptional level. May be catalytically inactive although it seems to have kept all necessary active site residues

go_class.description: hydrolase activity, acting on ester bonds
